Class CompanyRepUI

java.lang.Object
CompanyRepUI
public class CompanyRepUI extends Object
Handles the console-based user interface flow for company representatives. This class manages login, menu navigation and actions such as constructing internships, deciding on student applications, toggling internship visibility, viewing opportunities and changing passwords.

  • Constructor Details

    • CompanyRepUI

      public CompanyRepUI(StudentDbMgr studentDbMgr, CompanyRepDbMgr companyRepDbMgr, InternshipDbMgr internshipDbMgr, InternshipWithdrawalDbMgr internshipWithdrawalDbMgr)
      Creates a new CompanyRepUI and starts the interaction flow. The constructor logs in the company representative, then repeatedly shows the menu and handles user choices until the user quits or login fails too many times.
      Parameters:
      studentDbMgr - database manager for students
      companyRepDbMgr - database manager for company representatives
      internshipDbMgr - database manager for internships
      internshipWithdrawalDbMgr - database manager for internship withdrawals

  • Method Details

    • login

      public CompanyRep login(Scanner sc, CompanyRepPasswordMgr companyRepPasswordMgr)
      Prompts the user for username and password and attempts to log in as a company representative.
      Parameters:
      sc - shared Scanner for user input
      companyRepPasswordMgr - password manager used for validation
      Returns:
      the logged-in CompanyRep if successful, or null if login fails

    • menu

      public int menu(Scanner sc)
      Displays the main menu for company representatives and reads the user's choice. Returns -1 if the choice is outside the valid range.
      Parameters:
      sc - shared Scanner for user input
      Returns:
      the chosen menu option, or -1 if invalid

    • constructInternship

      public void constructInternship(CompanyRep companyRep, Scanner sc)
      Guides the company representative through the process of constructing a new internship by prompting for the relevant details.
      Parameters:
      companyRep - the logged-in CompanyRep creating the internship
      sc - shared Scanner for user input

    • approveRejectInternship

      public void approveRejectInternship(CompanyRep companyRep, Scanner sc)
      Handles the flow for approving or rejecting a student's internship application. Prompts for the student's matriculation number, the decision and the internship title.
      Parameters:
      companyRep - the logged-in CompanyRep making the decision
      sc - shared Scanner for user input

    • toggleInternshipVisibility

      public void toggleInternshipVisibility(CompanyRep companyRep)
      Toggles the visibility of an internship owned by the company representative. Prompts for the internship name and the desired visibility state.
      Parameters:
      companyRep - the logged-in CompanyRep whose internship is updated

    • viewInternshipOpps

      public void viewInternshipOpps(CompanyRep companyRep, Scanner sc)
      Displays internship opportunities that are relevant to the company representative. The filtering logic uses the internship database manager and display components.
      Parameters:
      companyRep - the logged-in CompanyRep
      sc - shared Scanner for user input

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(CompanyRep companyRep, Scanner sc, CompanyRepPasswordMgr companyRepPasswordMgr)
      Prompts the company representative to change their password and attempts to update it using the provided password manager.
      Parameters:
      companyRep - the logged-in CompanyRep whose password is changed
      sc - shared Scanner for user input
      companyRepPasswordMgr - password manager used to perform the change
